name: Alchemic Jousts
description: Alchemic Jousts is a 2D action strategy game where you discover new Skills by combining the ones you already know. Command your elementals and support them with a wide variety of Skills. Control the arena and crush your opponent in one-to-one encounters!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista x64 Processor: 2.4 GHz single core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 500, Radeon HD 4000, Intel 4000 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
